channel.title: Sore throat
channel.description:
ok so ive been with the flu for the last couple of days, fucking horrible - felt worst than when i got swine flu, ive reached 104 fever and have nasal mucus as well as throat mucus and the worst thing of all is the sore throat i have
i went to the doctor like 2 days ago and he said it was viral and told me to take regular shit like advil, motrin, ibuprofen, etc and for the sore throat he told me to just take cepacol (some throat relievers)
even though it says to take 2 every 4 hours, ive taken around 6 the last 3 hours and still no relief.
ive tried like a dozen different types of cough-drops/throat-relievers, ive gargled hot salt water, and my most recent attempt was taking a teaspoon of tabasco and shoving it down the back of my throat...then swallowing it. it burned like a bitch but did relieve the pain for a while, although i didnt really manage to get it to my throat rather my tongue so it didnt prove very effective, although i will be trying out gargling (and then swallowing) hot water diluted with tabasco as i've seen this approach get many positive reviews on some [url=http://www.earthclinic.com/CURES/sore_throat34.html#TABASCOSAUCE_27149]random site[/url] (ps lol @ the side effects some of them experienced)
so im really kinda desperate, anyone have some good advice? (preferably something which only requires shit likely found in a common household)

item.title: Sore throat
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Do you have Asthma, and or coughing a lot?

if your coughing a lot then you could have pneumonia. When I had pneumonia my throat hurt so I thought it was strep throat, but if your also coughing a lot and severely then you most likely would have pneumonia.

Read full topic

item.title: Sore throat
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

I’ve found these to be amazing whenever I’ve had a sore throat. I always keep a few packets handy. I’m unsure where you’ll get them in the US, but you’ll obviously have to get something with the same active ingredient (Amylmetacresolr), same as Strepsils, only cheaper.

I just suck on one every hour or so until the pain is bearable. Cups of medium strength tea in the evenings also help a lot.

Read full topic

item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

I drink greentea always have a halls in my mouth… Sleep lots and lots of sleep. When you up do nothing drink greentea and have cough drops. thats what I do and i ussauly sleep about 19/24 hours of the day when i have the flu.

item.title: Sore throat
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:7, topic:350323”][quote author=cows_be_sacred link=topic=446688.msg3278973#msg3278973 date=1279749650]
Drink warm beverages such as milk, and try to drink warm water. Get a lot of sleep and rest, and take some tylenol.
This usually does it for me.

[ps u could die from this]
[/quote]
you could die from anything[/quote]
in fact i just died from typing this post

Read full topic

item.title: Sore throat
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“Holic, post:2, topic:350323”]How do your tonsils look? I’m sick currently with strep and what I always do to fix the throat thing is either get fruit popsicles (avoid sugary ones) and just hold it against them. or make a fruit slushee (again, dont get a sugary one from like 711 or something) and just sip on those all day.
Then when it hurts, gargle and repeat. Just sleep lots too, after it stops hurting go lay down then youll be out for a few hours and wake up feeling a lot better because you’re not awake and irritating it.[/quote]My tonsils actually don’t look that bad - they’ve looked much worst. They look infected and kind of white which is why I thought I had strep (yet again), but apparently I didn’t. Although, is it possible for a viral infection to evolve into a bacterial one? Because I went to the doctor when the throat pain was only beginning, it didn’t hurt much at that time, I just had high fever. But yet again, I do have a ton of mucus which leaves me keen to believe that it actually is viral. Anyways, I had read that popsicles worked on some people, although hot things always serve me better; for instance, soup always numbs my throat for a while. But I guess I’ll give it a try.

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:3, topic:350323”]A gargle of some diluted vinegar usually does the trick for me.[/quote]I assume it burns at the beginning? And do you just use regular vinegar or ACV, which I’ve read is much more effective?

Read full topic

item.title: Sore throat
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

A gargle of some diluted vinegar usually does the trick for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Sore throat
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

How do your tonsils look? I’m sick currently with strep and what I always do to fix the throat thing is either get fruit popsicles (avoid sugary ones) and just hold it against them. or make a fruit slushee (again, dont get a sugary one from like 711 or something) and just sip on those all day.
Then when it hurts, gargle and repeat. Just sleep lots too, after it stops hurting go lay down then youll be out for a few hours and wake up feeling a lot better because you’re not awake and irritating it.

Read full topic
